General.Name: Feng Hsin Steel Co Ltd
General.Description: Feng Hsin Steel Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of steel products in Taiwan. It provides angle, channel, square, flat, round, and deformed bars, as well as rebars; and bar in coils. The company was incorporated in 1969 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

1.Name: Kuei-Yu  Huang
1.Title: Mang. of Fin. Division & Accounting Mang.
